Ability to create new study groups with titles, descriptions, and topics
Functionality to search and join existing study groups
Resource sharing feature allowing users to upload and download study materials
Project collaboration workspace with discussion threads and file sharing
Personal center displaying user profile information and activity history
Group management dashboard for creators to manage members and content
Real-time messaging or discussion forum within each study group
Notifications system for group activities and resource updates
Responsive web design with alice blue background and steel blue components
Frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
Backend API server connecting to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Database schema supporting users, groups, resources, projects, and discussions
Package.json configuration with 'install:all' and 'dev' npm scripts
User interface for browsing and filtering available study groups
